Out.of.the.Furnace.2014.BDRip.Dual.Audio.XviD-AFTP

Russell (Christian Bale) and Rodney (Casey Affleck) are two very close brothers. Russell lives with Lena (Zoe Saldanha) to engage in a crime and end up behind bars. After being released he receives news of the murder of his brother. Now he must choose between his freedom and his desire for justice.
